\Aura\Sql

\Aura\SqlAbstractMapper

An abstract class to map entity fields to table columns.

modifySelect()

modifySelect(\Aura\Sql\Query\Select $select, array $cols) : void

Given a Select object and an array of column names, modifies the Select SELECT those columns AS their mapped entity field names FROM the mapped table.

Parameters

\Aura\Sql\Query\Select $select

The Select object to modify.
array $cols

The columns to select; if empty, selects all mapped columns.

Tags

None found

modifyInsert()

modifyInsert(\Aura\Sql\Query\Insert $insert, object $entity) : void

Given an Insert query object and an entity object, modifies the Insert to use the mapped table, with the column names mapped from the entity field names, and binds the entity field values to the query.

Parameters

\Aura\Sql\Query\Insert $insert

The Insert query object.
object $entity

The entity object.

Tags

None found

modifyUpdate()

modifyUpdate(\Aura\Sql\Query\Update $update, object $entity, array $initial_data) : void

Given an Update query object and an entity object, modifies the Update to use the mapped table, with the column names mapped from the entity field names, binding the entity field values to the query, and setting a where condition to match the primary column to the identity value.

When an array of initial data is present, the update will use only changed values (instead of sending all the entity values).

Parameters

\Aura\Sql\Query\Update $update

The Update query object.
object $entity

The entity object.
array $initial_data

The initial data for the entity object; used to determine what values have changed on the entity.

Tags

None found

modifyDelete()

modifyDelete(\Aura\Sql\Query\Delete $delete, object $entity) : void

Given a Delete query object and an entity object, modify the Delete to use the mapped table, and to set a where condition to match the primary column to the identity value.

Parameters

\Aura\Sql\Query\Delete $delete

The Delete query object.
object $entity

The entity object.

Tags

None found

getInsertData()

getInsertData(object $entity) : array

Given an entity object, creates an array of mapped table column names to entity field values for inserts.

Parameters

object $entity

The entity object.

Returns

array

Tags

None found

getUpdateData()

getUpdateData(object $entity, array $initial_data) : array

Given an entity object, creates an array of mapped table column names to entity field values for updates; when an array of initial data is present, the returned array will have only changed values.

Parameters

object $entity

The entity object.
array $initial_data

The initial data for the entity.

Returns

array

Tags

None found

getUpdateDataChanges()

getUpdateDataChanges(object $entity, array $initial_data) : array

Given an entity object and an array of initial data, returns an array mapped table columns and changed values.

Parameters

object $entity

The entity object.
array $initial_data

The array of initial data.

Returns

array

Tags

None found

compare()

compare(mixed $new, mixed $old) : bool

Compares a new value and an old value to see if they are the same.

If they are both numeric, use loose (==) equality; otherwise, use strict (===) equality.

Parameters

mixed $new

The new value.
mixed $old

The old value.

Returns

bool —

True if they are equal, false if not.

Tags

None found
